type.value: The value of the permission type can only be 'API' or 'MENU'

name.empty: The permission name cannot be empty
name.length: Permission names cannot exceed to 50 characters

path.empty: When the type value is 'API', the path field cannot be empty
path.length: Permission paths cannot exceed to 100 characters

method.empty: When the type value is 'API', the menuId method cannot be empty
method.length: Permission method cannot exceed to 10 characters

menuId.empty: When the type value is 'MENU', the menuId field cannot be empty
menuId.length: The ID of the permission association menu cannot exceed 100 characters

assignment.bad: Permission assignment failed with no permissions or user found

menu.emptyId: The user ID cannot be empty
menu.emptyPath: The menu path cannot be empty or empty
menu.unPermission: The user does not have path permissions, please log in to try again or contact the administrator
